meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

presenters: Heather Lowe, Interim Director, Dallas Public Library
Martine Elyse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Glenn Ayars, Assistant Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Christopher Wagley, Chief Operating Officer of KERA

Jacqulin Justice, Assistant Director, Convention and Event Spaces

Luis L. Villarreal, Sergeant of Police, Dallas Police Department
Shannon Adams, Library Adult Services Manager, Dallas Public Library

agenda_items.title: National Trends in Multi-Use Library Facilities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on trends in library facilities and their integration into community services.
